mozilla.components.service.fxa

Class FirefoxAccount

  • RustObject
    • mozilla.components.service.fxa.FirefoxAccount

  • public class FirefoxAccount
extends RustObject

    FirefoxAccount represents the authentication state of a client.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FxaResult<java.lang.String> beginOAuthFlow(java.lang.String[] scopes, boolean wantsKeys)
      Constructs a URL used to begin the OAuth flow for the requested scopes and keys.
      FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.OAuthInfo> completeOAuthFlow(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String state)
      Authenticates the current account using the code and state parameters fetched from the redirect URL reached after completing the sign in flow triggered by FirefoxAccount.beginOAuthFlow.
      void destroy(RawFxAccount p) 
      FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.OAuthInfo> getOAuthToken(java.lang.String[] scopes)
      Fetches a new access token for the desired scopes using an internally stored refresh token.
      FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.Profile> getProfile(boolean ignoreCache)
      Fetches the profile object for the current client either from the existing cached account, or from the server (requires the client to have access to the profile scope).
      FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.Profile> getProfile()
      Convenience method to fetch the profile from a cached account by default, but fall back to retrieval from the server.
      RawFxAccount getRawPointer() 
      SyncKeys getSyncKeys()
      Fetches keys for encryption/decryption of Firefox Sync data.
      java.lang.String getTokenServerEndpointURL()
      Fetches the token server endpoint, for authentication using the SAML bearer flow.
      java.lang.String newAssertion(java.lang.String audience)
      Creates a new SAML assertion from the account state, which can be posted to the token server endpoint fetched from FirefoxAccount.getTokenServerEndpointURL in order to get an access token.
      void setRawPointer(RawFxAccount p) 
      java.lang.String toJSONString()
      Saves the current account's authentication state as a JSON string, for persistence in the Android KeyStore/shared preferences. The authentication state can be restored using FirefoxAccount.Companion.fromJSONString.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy(RawFxAccount p)

      • beginOAuthFlow

        public FxaResult<java.lang.String> beginOAuthFlow(java.lang.String[] scopes,
                                                  boolean wantsKeys)

        Constructs a URL used to begin the OAuth flow for the requested scopes and keys.

        Parameters:
        scopes - List of OAuth scopes for which the client wants access
        wantsKeys - Fetch keys for end-to-end encryption of data from Mozilla-hosted services
        Returns:
        FxaResult that resolves to the flow URL when complete

      • getProfile

        public FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.Profile> getProfile(boolean ignoreCache)

        Fetches the profile object for the current client either from the existing cached account, or from the server (requires the client to have access to the profile scope).

        Parameters:
        ignoreCache - Fetch the profile information directly from the server
        Returns:
        FxaResult<class Profile> representing the user's basic profile info

      • getProfile

        public FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.Profile> getProfile()

        Convenience method to fetch the profile from a cached account by default, but fall back to retrieval from the server.

        Returns:
        FxaResult<class Profile> representing the user's basic profile info

      • newAssertion

        public java.lang.String newAssertion(java.lang.String audience)

        Creates a new SAML assertion from the account state, which can be posted to the token server endpoint fetched from FirefoxAccount.getTokenServerEndpointURL in order to get an access token.

        Returns:
        String representing the SAML assertion
        See Also:
        FirefoxAccount.getTokenServerEndpointURL

      • getTokenServerEndpointURL

        public java.lang.String getTokenServerEndpointURL()

        Fetches the token server endpoint, for authentication using the SAML bearer flow.

      • getSyncKeys

        public SyncKeys getSyncKeys()

        Fetches keys for encryption/decryption of Firefox Sync data.

      • completeOAuthFlow

        public FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.OAuthInfo> completeOAuthFlow(java.lang.String code,
                                                                             java.lang.String state)

        Authenticates the current account using the code and state parameters fetched from the redirect URL reached after completing the sign in flow triggered by FirefoxAccount.beginOAuthFlow.

        Modifies the FirefoxAccount state.

        See Also:
        FirefoxAccount.beginOAuthFlow

      • getOAuthToken

        public FxaResult<mozilla.components.service.fxa.OAuthInfo> getOAuthToken(java.lang.String[] scopes)

        Fetches a new access token for the desired scopes using an internally stored refresh token.

        Parameters:
        scopes - List of OAuth scopes for which the client wants access
        Returns:
        FxaResult<class OAuthInfo> that stores the token, along with its scopes and keys when complete
        Throws:
        Unauthorized - if the token could not be retrieved (eg. expired refresh token)

      • toJSONString

        public java.lang.String toJSONString()

        Saves the current account's authentication state as a JSON string, for persistence in the Android KeyStore/shared preferences. The authentication state can be restored using FirefoxAccount.Companion.fromJSONString.

        Returns:
        String containing the authentication details in JSON format
        See Also:
        FirefoxAccount.Companion.fromJSONString

      • getRawPointer

        public RawFxAccount getRawPointer()

      • setRawPointer

        public void setRawPointer(RawFxAccount p)
